SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChangeSelectionCommand
The ChangeSelectionCommand class represents a command for changing the text selection indices in an Engine.
ChangeSelectionMemento
The ChangeSelectionMemento class represents a memento object used to store the state of a selection change in the context of an Engine.
Command
The Command interface represents a generic command that can be executed.
CopyCommand
The CopyCommand class represents a command for copying selected text using an Engine.
CutCommand
The CutCommand class represents a command for cutting selected text using an Engine.
DeleteCommand
The DeleteCommand class represents a command for deleting selected text using an Engine.
Engine
Main API for the text editing engine
EngineImpl
Main API for the text editing engine
InsertCommand
The InsertCommand class represents a command for inserting text into an Engine.
InsertMemento
The InsertMemento class represents a memento object specifically designed for capturing the state related to an insert operation.
Invoker
The Invoker class represents an invoker that manages and executes commands.
MainTest_V0
The MainTest_V0 class serves as a test program for the functionality of EngineImpl and related classes in the Back_End module for The V0 of the project.
MainTest_V1
The MainTest_V1 class serves as a commented-out test program for the functionality of the Back_End module, including the use of EngineImpl, Invoker, and various command implementations (e.g., CutCommand, PasteCommand).
MainTest_V2
The code MainTest_V2 demonstrates the usage of Engine, Recorder, and Invoker components with various commands in a simulated text editor environment.
MainTest_V2_Command
The MainTest_V2_Command class serves as a test program for evaluating the functionality of the command pattern implementation in the back-end text editing application.
MainTest_V2_CopyCommand
The MainTest_V2_CopyCommand class serves as a test program for evaluating the functionality of the CopyCommand in the back-end text editing application using the command pattern.
MainTest_V2_CutCommand
The MainTest_V2_CutCommand class serves as a test program for evaluating the functionality of the CutCommand in the back-end text editing application using the command pattern.
MainTest_V2_DeleteCommand
The MainTest_V2_DeleteCommand class serves as a test program for evaluating the functionality of the DeleteCommand in the back-end text editing application using the command pattern.
MainTest_V2_InsertCommand
The MainTest_V2_InsertCommand class serves as a test program for evaluating the functionality of the InsertCommand in the back-end text editing application using the command pattern.
MainTest_V2_PasteCommand
The MainTest_V2_PasteCommand class serves as a test program for evaluating the functionality of the PasteCommand in the back-end text editing application using the command pattern.
Memento
The Memento interface represents an object used to store and retrieve the state of another object, typically used for supporting undo and redo operations.
Originator
The Originator interface represents an object that can create and restore its own memento objects.
PasteCommand
The PasteCommand class represents a command for pasting content from the clipboard into an Engine.
Recordable
The Recordable interface represents an entity that can be recorded, undoable, and redoable.
Recorder
The Recorder class is responsible for recording and replaying commands executed on an Engine.
ReplayCommand
The ReplayCommand class represents a command that triggers the replay of recorded commands using a provided Recorder.
SceneController
The SceneController class manages the interaction between the graphical user interface (GUI) components and the underlying logic of the Text Editor application.
Selection
Provides access to selection control operations
SelectionImpl
Provides access to selection control operations
StartCommand
The StartCommand class represents a command that triggers the start of recording using a provided Recorder.
StopCommand
The StopCommand class represents a command that triggers the stop of recording using a provided Recorder.
Text_Editor
The Text_Editor class represents the main entry point for the Text Editor application.
